title: Inflation rate in Luxembourg 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 5.64 was reported at Year 1984
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.01 was reached at Year 2009

max_summary: The chart in general has a zig-zag shape.
The chart in general has a zig-zag shape.
The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
The chart in general has a zig-zag shape.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 5.64 was reported at Year 1984
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.01 was reached at Year 2009

The line rapidly remained stable by 92.67% from Year 1985 to 1986,increased by 1300.0% from Year 1987 to 1988,remained stable by 142.86% from Year 1988 to 1989,remained stable by 270.59% from Year 1999 to 2000,remained stable by 99.76% from Year 2008 to 2009,increased by 27900.0% from Year 2009 to 2010,remained stable by 91.43% from Year 2014 to 2015, and lastly, increased by 5175.0% from Year 2016 to 2017.
